review_text: Great place to stay ! Very clean and easy with instructions
Great place to stay in the Gadsden area!
Absolutely loved staying here! The house was aligning. We had everything we needed. The covered porch was so nice after a long day of hard work. Thank you, thank you
Thomas was a great host and has a beautiful house to stay in - 10/10 recommend.

My family and I loved our stay at Thomas. The best airbnb we have ever stayed at. Kitchen and bathroom were well stocked.
The beds were comfortable. Will definitely be returning.

Thomas was extremely responsive to all questions. House was immaculate. He left a notebook outlining clear instructions on how to lock/unlock door to grinding your own fresh coffee. Checkout was a breeze. Will definitely be back

This was our 2nd stay and we love it! The home is comfortable, clean, very updated and easy to find. The neighborhood is quiet and friendly. So close to excellent restaurants and an easy trip to see the lake and water. We will definitely stay again. Love the screened in porch!!
This place is fantastic! Family friendly, very clean, everything you need is there! This was our favorite place we've stayed in the area with the most reasonable price! 5 stars all the way around!

This home was amazing! I am usually very skeptical of airbnbs but this place made me feel right at home! Thomas was a great host and answered all my questions (which was a lot). All in all, 10/10 recommend! The house had a beautiful location, and was close to a lot of restaurants!
Great, hospitable host with a beautiful place!

Thomas’ home was immaculate and very comfortable. It is an excellent home if you have business or family in Gadsden. Neighbors were polite and neighborhood was very well kept and close to town/restaurants. We look forward to staying again in the future.
Great house. Very easy to find. Lovely location. Tommy was very helpful with things to do around town. Great for a weekend vacation or any vacation.
Great house to stay in, extremely clean, modern, great decor and style. Peaceful location as well
Wonderful place to stay in downtown area . It’s close to many restaurants and shops . We definitely will be back.
Nice place to stay

Micah is an amazing host. Very pleasant to interact with. He was so helpful and concerned about our comfort. Excellent communication, even well before we arrived. Offered us a late check out at a very minimal charge, knowing that we arrived very late and had to dress and be fresh the next day for a wedding. Staying at Micah's was refreshing. It's nice to know that their are happy people in the earth still.
This was absolutely the coolest Airbnb I have stayed in. It was such a memorable experience.

The Friends Loft was Awesome! Very clean, spacious with an open floor plan in the Kitchen & Living room. The bedrooms frosted doors give extra privacy. I was able to enjoy all the local events by walking a block or 2 from the loft. I also felt very safe and the neighbors were very friendly! I will be renting again for my grandmother 90th birthday celebration!
Easy to communicate with
Great Space! Definitely will be going back. It was chill and relaxing fun.
Wonderful place! Spacious! Just as listed! I would HIGHLY recommend!

This was awesome. Super fun visit to nearby Noccalula Falls, then back here for the night. Several excellent restaurants just a few steps away from this loft apartment. The FRIENDS theme was a great idea, and of course we watched a couple episodes which was a lot of fun in the environment that these hosts created. Clean building, safe area, loved it!
We had a fantastic stay in the loft. It was a great central spot for our group to gather and take advantage of everything in walking distance.

I would highly recommend Micah’s place it was extremely clean and it was really easy to complete checkin also the whole place smelled really good soon as we walked through the door as well . If you are in need of a place to stay in Gadsden then look no more
It was a great stay

Enjoyed a girls weekend with visiting family from out of town. The location was perfect for enjoying the local chili cook off and restaurants. Unit is spacious and comfortable. Theme is on point! Will recommend to family and friends coming to the area.

We LOVED Everything about the stay. the loft is fantastic! It is super clean and decorated so cute. the location is close to restaurants, stores, coffee shops. Micah is great with communication. This is where we plan on staying our next trip to Gadsden.
Highly recommend. : )
Loved this place, will definitely book again!
Large space with the Friends theme.
very cute place ..we had a great time
Great location and host. Loft is well within walking distance of anywhere you'd want to go downtown and is drivable to everything else within a few miles. I would definitely recommend it.
Another great stay!
Thank you for an awesome stay!

I booked the friends suite for my daughter’s 15th birthday weekend. She was wanting to go ice-skating and we had found the outside arena in Gadsden. I told her to look on Airbnb and see what she could find. She found this Airbnb so I went ahead and booked. The day we left for our fun weekend, her friend tested positive for the flu, so that kind of made the trip a little not so fun at first.
When we got to the apartment it was everything and more than what I saw in the pictures! We enjoyed it and everything we needed was within 5 miles! We are booking again! I HIGHLY recommend it.

Stayed at Micah's Airbnb and loved it! It's super spacious and comfortable, plus the location is perfect—everything's walkable, but it's far enough away from the action that noise isn't an issue. Micah is an awesome host, super friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend!

Great place to stay at! Micah was extremely professional and a very great communicator. He went above and beyond my expectations, and look forward to booking with him again! Also very beautiful area and neat town. Tons to do within walking distance!

This is the tip of the sword for Gadsden.
Excellent Location. Stay here it’s perfect.
Great communication! Beautiful place!

We came for a one night stay on our way through Gadsden and loved our stay! Once we were there we didn’t have to move the car. We could walk to restaurants nearby and we loved the cleanliness and theming!
Great loft. Exactly like pictures. Host was quick to respond to messages. I would stay here again.
Excellent place just as advertised enjoyed our stay
Loved staying here for a short weekend! The F•R•I•E•N•D•S theme was so cute and fun, we loved it !
Adorable place in an adorable town. Nice and modern and clean. Definitely a must if you’re a Friends fanatic!
Fabulous
We loved it!
Love this home second time booking it

My sister was getting married the weekend of our stay and we were looking for a great place with a convenient location. This Airbnb is across the street from my sisters wedding venue (the pitman theatre). We thought this specific Airbnb would be perfect because it’s also friends themed. Who doesn’t love the friends tv show? Am I right?! We walked in that Thursday afternoon and were shocked at how gorgeous and clean this loft is. The high ceilings and giants windows in the bedrooms were everything! My sisters wedding photographer got the most breathtaking wedding photos standing in front of the tall windows. The friends theme was executed perfectly and they provided us with makeup wipes,laundry detergent and dishwashing detergent which was so helpful. Micah was very helpful and proactive with answering any questions that I had. I can’t wait to book another Airbnb stay with Micah again. My husband and I are already planning. Our stay was pure bliss. Thanks, Micah!!

This lovely home was in a great neighborhood and very quiet.
Great location too.
It was really fixed up cute and extremely clean. The living room was nice and big for all of us to enjoy each other. The bedrooms were all nice with great beds .
Well worth staying when you have your family all in one place.
Our family would love to go back and stay longer next trip toward Gadsden.
Beautiful home!

This is a clean, comfortable, quiet place to stay. The host is very responsive and nice. We had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. We would stay here again. I highly recommend this home.
Sandra is a very gracious hostess! We loved her home and her family close by. Very clean, comfortable and felt like home in no time!

We felt right at home. The aprtment was ready for us early and was stocked with snacks, coffee, tea and water when we arrived. Everything was just as described - very neat and clean. The surroundings are beautiful. Our host was very helpful and responsive. She has some awesome recommendations for dining and things to do in the area. Thanks for hosting us!
We had a quick overnight trip but I'm so glad this is where we ended up. Very comfortable location and a great night's sleep. We highly recommend it.

What a delightful room! It was just the place we needed to rest. Every detail has been thought of at Sandra and Lynn's place. Very relaxing, comforting, and refreshing. It was very spacious for a 1 room for 3 people. the addition of paper plates and plastic utensils was very thoughtful!
Nice little place. Any questions I had were answered quicklu
Thanks Sandra! I will be back.
Sandra’s place is a lovely example of southern hospitality! It’s a sweet, simple, and clean apartment with great fenced in yard for the dogs. They were friendly and responsive!

This place is a little piece of heaven after a long day traveling! The host has thought of everything creating a nice relaxing stay four us and our pups! We would definitely stay again if ever in the area❤️
Sandra and Lynn were so friendly. Their home and property is beautiful and peaceful.

My first Airbnb. I'm sold and will be using Airbnb instead of hotels in the future. Lynn and Sandra were very accommodating and had a binder clearly laying out everything from using the wifi to local recommendations. The place had everything you may need including snack for both humans and dogs. I had 3 dogs with me and they provided access to the entire large backyard. I will be doing this same trip again in the future and I'll be looking to stay at the same place again.

We've enjoyed cozy and home-like relaxing atmosphere. The apartment was so comfortable and lovely decorated. We were touched with lots of cozy items, especially all the adorable owls. The hots were welcoming and responsive. All instructions provided were clear and detailed, a guest book with host's local recommendations was very useful. Great hot shower, lots of towels. Being able to park in a garage was a separate plus. Special thanks for the cookies!
It was a quiet and enjoyable stay.

This was our favorite vacation yet! We absolutely loved our stay. The hosts are incredibly warm and welcoming and went above and beyond for us. We spent a week exploring the area including little river canyon, cathedral caves, NASA, botanical gardens, de Soto falls and guntersville and everything was amazing! The value of this stay made everything possible for us and there were so many thoughtful touches and amenities. Highly recommend and we will be back!
Was glad Sandra met me and showed me around when I got there. Nice conversation, convenient location, sweet place to stay. I will stay again!

A great upstairs suite! My German Shepherd dog and I only stayed one night and it was extremely pleasant. Slept like a baby! Sandra was extremely communicative and quickly responded to any of my questions or concerns. I would definitely stay again. The use of the garage to park my car, especially given the inclement weather was a real plus!

This was a great stay for us as an overnight to break up a long trip. It was so spacious and welcoming, with everything you can imagine to make the stay comfy. If you forgot any toiletry, an extra was there. Keurig coffee with various selections, plus tea. Chilled water and a tray of fun snacks, too. Sitting area spacious with comfortable chairs and bed, too. Large grassy fenced area for our dog to really stretch her legs. It’s a lovely rural setting, 10-12 minutes to an Ingles so not far at all. Very clear instructions for everything. Great outside lighting and delightful entry in the garage, welcoming guests as they check-in. We will definitely come again as our mid-way stop on way to NOLA. Thank you, Sandra, for sharing your beautiful home with us!

Great place to stay, will definitely recommend! Very safe and so cute and comfy. The coffee was a godsend in the morning for our early moving drive home. The room was so clean and the snacks were also a great touch.
This is one of the best air bnbs we stayed at!
Sandra was a very thoughtful host. Made sure that my dad & husband had everything they needed for their fishing tournament!
Perfect place for our small family and pup to spend the night prior to a weekend of camping and hiking in the area. Thank you, Sandra!
Sandra was a very kind and responsive host. Her place was clean, quiet, and comfortable. Having access to the garage was a huge plus! Would definitely recommend.

Sandra's place was absolutely wonderful! We arrived after dark and she had the garage door open, lights in the driveway, lamp on in the garage and a lamp on upstairs. The place is very welcoming and feels like home. Sandra has snacks out, waters, coffee bar and even treats for your pets if you bring them. It was just my son and I traveling and we felt perfectly safe staying here. We will definitely save her place and stay again when coming through.

We brought our 2 year old dog and We were in the area to pick up our new puppy; Sandra knew this and left all types of treats and doggie snacks out for us. Such a sweet touch. If we are ever in that area again we will definitely stay again. Definitely recommend!!
Loved this place!

Excellent stay
Above 5 stars
There are so many little thoughtful details that allow a person to feel right at home. I’ll stay here again soon.
Sandra’s rental had everything we needed. She even had the most thoughtful touches added for a coffee bar and snacks.
Comfortable and homey place

After backpacking in the area for several days, this was a perfect spot to get refreshed with a shower and rest before driving home. Lots of amenities! Sandra has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable. Highly recommend!
Perfect for a getaway with your partner!!
perfect place for me! only spent a few hours there but it was exactly what I was looking for! easy to access, private and clean! Definitely recommend
Wonderful, welcoming stay! So glad I found this AirBnB!! Excellent hosts! Felt right at home!
Excellent stay!!
Perfect place
Really enjoyed staying at Sandra’s place. Perfect for my travels! The space is clean, comfortable and thoughtfully laid out. Will definitely look to stay here again if I’m in the area.
We had a very nice stay at Sandra's place. Easy to find, quiet and well equipped. Friendly hosts who responded quickly to all my communications.

Fabulous place to stay. We felt at home and enjoyed the peaceful surroundings. Our pups enjoyed the big, fenced yard to play in. Should you need accommodations in/near Leesburg, you will not be disappointed staying with Sandra.
Beautiful location in between Gadsden and Leesburg/Centre area
Sandra was a lovely host, super responsive and thoughtful! Would definitely stay again if in the area.
Sandra is a fabulous host and the place is immaculate and beautiful. We are repeat guests and will stay again. If you are staying in the area, make reservations with Sandra!

Sandra's place was absolutely beautiful! It is so roomy, so comfortable and felt more like a resort especially peeking out the window when it got dark with all the warm lights. I can't say enough wonderful!

Absolutely a perfect spot to stay for two people and a dog. Very comfortable and a lot of unexpected but greatly appreciated things. Like treats for your dog, multiple snacks, and if you forgot something it was there. From soap, toothpaste, toothbrush, to deodorant, shaving cream and q-tips. Just extremely thoughtful.
The place is very clean. Nice place to stay when visiting the area or passing through. We will stay again. Nice, quiet and relaxing.

The place was cute and cozy. It's an in-law suite as described in the listing so you don't have a kitchen but I didn't need one so it worked for me. Enjoyed the fenced in backyard for my little guy, (my dog)🐶 also there were snacks and bottled water in the fridge which was nice. The bed was very comfortable, slept great.
Sandra was a great host. Her facility is super clean. Had snacks and water and coffee. Nice touch. Definitely would recommend her and would definitely stay there again

Great communication and easy booking. We had an issue occur and actually had to cancel and she was the best. She was right on with helping us fix the issue since our. Vehicle had broke down and we wasn’t able to make it.
Sandra was a wonderful host. She was very responsive and clear about checking in. I would stay again if in the area.
Sandra’s place was great! Clean, convenient, and they were such great hosts. Great value for money. They even had treats for my 2 fur babies! Will be back and recommend this place to everyone!
great place! the room was just as described. lots of amenities and easy to access. felt clean and comfortable.
This was a fabulous stay for a family of 3 plus pooch. My son especially loved the snacks! We would definitely stay here again.
I stayed here to climb at Sandrock during the day. It was perfect for what I needed, especially in the winter.
If you're in the area, especially with dogs, I would highly recommend! The place was stocked with everything we could have needed, and we + the pups loved it.
This is a cute little hideaway in a quiet neighborhood.

Extremely accommodating for us while we moved across country and needed somewhere to stay with our pets. Huge yard for the dogs to run around in. Felt very Private, safe, and quiet. One of the cleanest and best airbnbs we have ever ever stayed at.

We loved our stay at Sandra's. The coffee bar and snacks were both great touches, and we enjoyed having them. I was impressed to find decaf and other non-coffee options too. That was great. Her home is on a quiet street that makes an excellent dog walk, but it is also right next to a highway that enables easy access to the hiking trails and nature that we were there to visit.
Her book of recommendations was great - we had a wonderful meal at Harp and Clover.
Everything was clean. Sandra was incredibly accommodating and helpful. We travel with frozen dog food, and she allowed us to store it in her personal freezer. The garage was also nice because of the wind and cold weather.
Honestly, I can't say enough good things. Perhaps, a counter-height surface near the bathroom/kitchen area would have been helpful since we brought food and prepped with the microwave, but that was just a tiny thing. We would definitely stay again.

Sandra and her family are the epitome of Southern Hospitality! The place was above and beyond what my husband and I expected! Sandra was always quick to respond and help out whenever needed!
-Things outside the space-
You're close to restaurants (highly recommend Coosa Cafe) and not far from Cherokee Rock Village nor Noccalula Falls. You should go to the Rock Village to watch the sunset, but also to explore. The Christmas Lights at Noccalula Falls are far superior to Winterfest in Pigeon Forge. Tickets are $10 during the week and it includes a train ride and petting zoo. And if you enjoy caverns, you should check out Cathedral Caverns, it's an hour away, but worth it and affordable! Desoto Falls and Indian Falls were cool! We rolled in a little too late to be able to explore the other areas. Cheaha State Park, Bald Rock, and Rock Garden Trail were neat! If we ever come back to Alabama, we are definitely staying with Sandra again!
Very nice and quite worth the price

we stayed here on our way to and from Florida and communicated with Sandra several times as we traveled. The place was easy to find and very comfortable. The extra touches such as snacks and holiday decor added to its charm. We will definitely be back next time we head to Florida

We really enjoyed the little touches. And the snacks and coffee.!
My only regret is that I wish I had tipped a little bit more...
Beautiful and comfortable loft. Very clean and well stocked with snacks, drinks, and toiletries. WE WILL BE BACK

This place worked great for us! We brought our dog with us and she had treats and everything for us! She also had snacks, water, toiletries, etc for us when we arrived. Those little things made the stay great!

I absolutely loved this place and so did my 2 cats! It’s very clean and organized and well decorated. The area is very quiet and beautiful even for it being close to the main road. There were snacks, water and coffee provided along with some dog treats (no treats for cats in case you have a cat). I came in late November and they had put up some Christmas decorations which was so nice and made me feel right at home. I am absolutely saving this place and rebooking if Im in the area again!

OK where do I start? I normally don’t elaborate on these this much, but I have to say this is the best guest suite I’ve ever stayed in! The host makes you feel right at home and even offers you a spot to park in their garage. This host takes southern hospitality to a whole new level. There were snacks, waters, and several different types of coffee and cream. Also, extra toothbrushes and things that you wouldn’t expect to be there for you at an Airbnb. if I’m ever in the area again, I will for sure stay here.
Just what we needed for a great price.

We always enjoy our stay with Sandra. We feel like family during our stay and the accommodations are superb. If you enjoy fishing, travel with pets or simply want a peaceful, safe place to stay, Sandra’s place is perfect.
This cozy retreat was the perfect spot for my son and I to relax after climbing. Sandra included everything we could think of and even had snacks (which my son was delighted to find!)
I would absolutely stay again

We stopped here for a night while traveling from TN back to LA with our dogs. The room was immaculare, private over the garage, and stocked with coffee, tea, water, hot chocolate, apple cider, many different snacks, a basket of toiletries with anything you might need, phone charger, and even dog treats. We were able to let our dogs stretch out and roam the large fenced yard (and do some zoomies!). We chatted with Sandra while out walking our pups and she is one of the nicest people you'll ever meet. Bed was comfortable, room temp was perfect and had fridge, microwave, and tv. The retractable gate at the top of the stairs was a nice touch to keep our dogs in! Sandra really has throught of everything! We wished we could have stayed on another night because it was so relaxing and the binder she provided in the room showed some really great places in the area! Hope to return!
The place was perfect and had all the little extra touches that makes a stay even better! Snack basket was fantastic! Very friendly and responsive host too! Bonus Even got to park in the garage!

I needed a place to stay for a quick trip while I was on the road. They had flexible check in hours which is just what I needed this trip. The space itself was clean and organized. Would definitely recommend!

This was a great place to stay. Had everything you could want. The host had thought of everything! The bed was very comfortable, the room was a great size and had many accommodations not found in a hotel: variety of snacks, coffees, water, assorted toiletries. Great host!! We will be back!!
Fabulous stay! You won’t find better hospitality anywhere! Truly a Superhost! Attention to detail was unmatched! Nicer than the pictures showed!
Sandra's place was perfect for our overnight stopover from our road trip from TX to NC. It was very comfy and I loved access to their yard for my dog to play in. Friendly hosts and great snacks!

Immaculate & peaceful! We travel a lot and have stayed at many hotels and Airbnb’s. This was by far one of the best and we plan to stay here again in the future. What made the stay so pleasurable was the extra details. We arrived late (midnight) and the garage door was open and ready for us to pull in and park. We easily followed the directions for check in and made ourselves at home. There was a basket in the bathroom for items possibly forgotten, a snack basket, a cpap machine table, seasonal coffee cups, creamers, and a notebook with info. These extra details really made the place feel like home and safe.
Good host
Great little place and location. Off a main road, which made it easy to find at night. Quiet and comfortable. Sandra is very thoughtful with the amenities and everything was easy to locate.
I would definitely stay here again. So cute and quiet! Cozy little place!
Host was very nice!

It is lovely, extremely clean and well stocked rental. Sandra thought of so many things, from snacks to toiletries. the decor was adorable and charmin. The bed was comfortable, and I loved the extra table for my cpap machine. I would definitely stay again.

The place was very clean and thoughtfully stocked with everything we might need. Even with things we might have forgotten. It was close to the main road which made our comings and goings easy. We saw Sandra as we arrived and had a nice chat before she went to work. It was the perfect spot for us to be to visit a relative and enjoy a nice stay away from home. I liked the booklet Sandra put together of things to see and places to go. Excellent

Sandra and her Husband made us feel right at home from the get-go. Responded almost immediately when I called with a question. Their place has such beautiful grounds that they keep immaculate. They invited to join them at their church for Sunday service and it was like we were at home. We wish we had had time to utilize the fire-it and swing in the yard. Next time we will stay longer. It was a great stay!!
Charming place, peaceful and quiet. Sandra greeted me upon arrival and helped me get situated. Would definitely stay there again. Lots of homey little touches.
Sandra is a great host! I have stayed with her in several occasions and will book with her again.

The place was great to stay at! First of all, Sandra was super responsive when I had a question. Her place made us feel right at home. She had so many cute little "things" that just made our stay even more perfect. I'm pretty sure she thought of everything! She had snacks and water set out for us and even had little treats for our pup!
Sandra's place was small but very comfortable. Perfect for a couple or a very small family! And the price was unbeatable.
The location was also very nice. Quiet country (we even saw deer), and we felt safe the whole time. I loved that she even had a binder with things to check out, including places to eat. Highly recommend Decks and Docks!
Will definitely stay here again when in the area.
Great stay, Sandra was great!
Sandra was very nice and helpful the place looked great, especially for the price and had plenty of room for parking my boat ( she even loaned me an extension cord!)
What a beautiful place, plus thoughtful extras as described by others. Can only highly recommend!

This place is super cute and the hosts were awesome! Very helpful and the suite is done nicely. The bed was comfy and the air worked good, which are two pretty important things to us! Great little place! Thank you!
Sandra is a great host. We have enjoyed our stays with her. Sandra is warm and friendly and makes her guests feel at home. We will definitely book with Sandra again!

On a scale of 1 to 5 Sandra‘s place rates at 10. Her attention to detail is amazing and so full of the little things that make a stay away from home great. Complimentary, snacks, toiletries, and even treats for the pets! Are you kidding me?!
What a great surprise for us after driving 11 hours on our trip! She met us at the door and showed us to our room which was one of the best we’ve ever stayed in.
We cannot recommend her and her place enough. We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip down to Florida. Thank you Sandra!
Very Nice guest suite

Ms Sandra goes above and beyond with every little detail. It’s very quiet and I was especially happy to pull right into the garage. Awesome hot shower and comfy bed. She even leaves plenty of snacks! ❤️

My husband and I travel quite a bit through the southeast and stay almost exclusively in airbnbs. This was, without a doubt, one of our favorite stays so far. Quiet location, short drives to several hiking destinations, pet friendly, great snacks and coffee bar! The suite was clean and just as pictured. Sandra even provided a basket of essentials incase of any forgotten necessities. Everything was just as described, easy and clear instructions for checking in and out.
We loved it. Sandra was nice and responded quickly to our questions. Lovely place.
Great stay. I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family.
Wonderful as always 😊
Beautiful home in a nice spot

I don’t think there are enough words to describe our wonderful experience at Sandra’s place. It was everything she described and more. The place was very clean and comfortable we felt like we were at home. She had all the necessary amenities. The Keurig and snacks was a nice touch. The bed was so comfortable. The room was nicely decorated.
Overall, we had a wonderful stay. Sandra is warm and very personable. She makes you feel like you are at home.
A great place to stay!
The place was beautiful and very clean. Sandra was super nice and we would definitely book again!
This is the second time we have stayed here. It's very restful, safe, and clean. The snacks and bottled water was a special touch
Very clean, quiet place. I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone. Especially, women traveling alone.. I felt very safe.
Cozy space, clean and easy to get to. I reccomend this place.

This is a great place to stay. Sandra is very friendly and helpful. We travel with our dogs and she was accommodating to them as well. The apartment was very clean and tastefully decorated. It was stocked with snacks and persons items in the bathroom. We will definitely stay there again on our trips to Virginia.

I came out here for a work trip, and staying at Sandra’s was way better than any hotel. I felt right at home. Everything was nice and clean and cozy. Her hospitality exceeded all of my expectations! 10/10 I will stay here again.

I really enjoyed staying here on our cross county move. We were very comfortable and slept great! Much better than a noisy hotel… and you didn’t have to worry about the stuff in the car being stolen overnight.
Great place to stay!! Would stay again

This was the first AirBnB where I felt right at home! I appreciated all the small touches that Sandra had and how comfortable I felt. I will definitely stay here again if I get the chance and would 100% recommend to others!

The room was nice and comfy with plenty of room for me and my pups. I loved that she had a big fenced in yard for my dogs to run and play while I relaxed on the back porch. Sandra was a great host. I definitely plan on staying here during future visits to North Alabama.
Perfect airbnb to stay at! It’s super cute and clean and comfortable. Everything is well thought out, there are snacks, toiletries and water. Loved it so much!

This place was amazing and we felt at home ! We had everything we needed and Sandra thought of all the extras! The room was immaculate and stylish, so comfortable and peaceful. Would highly recommend !

Ilove it so much the 1st night we stayed there decided to book again on way home too. was the cutest little place perfect for 2 people. so comfortable and cozy. the local restaurants were awesome! the lake is beautiful.

Wonderful stay and hosts! Beautiful property, large room, comfortable bed and accommodations. Snacks, bottled water, and Keurig coffee pods were readily available! Perfect for us in every way! Highly recommend!
Excellent as always!!

We found this listing at the last minute. We liked that it was quiet and they had a fenced in yard for our puppy to run free. The place was VERY clean. Sandra provided snacks and bottled water along with any toiletries we might have forgotten to bring. A very safe neighborhood. Also her book listed some places of interest we ended up visiting and we're grateful she has suggested them to us. Otherwise we would have missed out on the wonderful day we had after leaving her property.

This was a great stay. The room was spacious, the bed was comfortable, and our dog greatly enjoyed the large fenced in back yard. Check-in was easy. I had a chance to talk with Sandra briefly and she was a great host. Next time we are swinging back through and looking to split up our drive, we'll definitely be staying here. Great price for what you get!
Sandra's place was great. perfect spot for a couple. super clean and quiet. lots to do around area. had dinner at local place on lake with live music. would highly recommend staying there!
Cute cozy spot for weary travelers 😊
Better than advertised!!! Clean, attention to details, extras are covered….. couldn’t ask for anything better.
Awesome people. Great place. The attention to details was amazing. Very clean and private. Incredible value for the money. Will definitely be going back.
We loved staying here! The room is decorated so cute! It’s very welcoming and cozy! My daughter did not want to leave! We’d love to stay again the next time we are in the area!

Wonderful overnight stop in this comfy space! Sandra and Lynn were very responsive and made sure we had everything we needed for ourselves and our pup. We normally get up and leave first thing during multi-day road trips, but we lingered for a few extra hours to enjoy the provided coffee and relax a bit more before another day of driving. Very comfortable bed as well!!
Perfect!

Sandra has thought of everything her guests might need or want. This was one of the best values I've had. Sandra was extremely responsive and helpful and even messaged me that I had left my pillow and is helping me retrieve it!
Traveling from MI to MS, Sandra’s place was the perfect pit stop after a long travel day! Super clean, comfortable and homey. 10/10 would recommend!

Very quiet and peaceful.
The fenced in backyard was a bonus and the wifi / internet service worked perfectly!

Executive Summary: If you’re planning to spend a relaxing weekend, week, or month in Gadsden, Kevin and Beth’s place is where you want to stay.
Long version: Gadsden isn’t a public transportation or walking town. Everything centers around boating and driving. If you’re planning to drive anyway, you should be sure to rest your head somewhere quiet and extremely comfortable. That’s Kevin’s place.
This is an Airbnb that’s designed to be lived in. And we speculate that the hosts have spent considerable time setting up and tuning the space to ensure that everything works smoothly.
The stay is a separate building not attached to the main house. You enter through sliding glass doors that provide a view of Kevin and Beth’s tributary of the lake. The space has very high ceilings throughout except for the bathroom. There’s a heater / air conditioner, two ceiling fans and even a dehumidifier (it’s on a lake in Georgia). During the heat of summer, we found the fans to be redundant.
Their kitchen amenities are of the highest quality. A serious gas stove, with quality pots and pans, Samsung microwave, coffee maker, fridge with ice maker, a toaster that actually evenly toasts, even an electric can opener. The only appliance missing from the kitchen is a dishwasher. Not an issue for us. We didn’t generate enough dirty dishes to mind hand-washing them.
The knives were even sharp. If you stay in enough airbnb’s you’ll learn how rare this is. The reason? There’s a knife steel in the block and a sharpener next to the block. Other hosts could learn a lot from Kevin.
The kitchen is large enough that two folks can prepare dinner without getting in each other’s way. As mentioned previously, all of the appliances are top-notch. If you need a tool or container and can’t find it in the drawers or cabinets, we would be astonished. Ice cream scoop, apple corer, immersion blender, julienne peeler…
There’s a large couch in the main room, and an easy chair, facing a large-screen TV which included the usual semi-infinite Roku options. Also in the main room is a high-end pool table.
And, there’s a roll-top desk as a wonderful dedicated workspace.
Adjacent to the breakfast bar in the kitchen is a dining table that will seat six comfortably.
The bathroom includes a shower with nozzles high enough for us tall folks, and room adjacent to the sink to store your stuff.
The mattress on the bed was a bit on the hard side, exactly the way we like it. The bedroom closet is large enough to hang everything in your suitcase.
We measured the internet speed as 40Mbs down and 20Mbs up, using our VPN.
Bottom line: Kevin and Beth’s place is quiet, comfortable, complete and fully functional. It doesn’t get any better than this. We’ll be back.
